name: Wb Aero - Bookmarks Toolbar
description:
The bookmarks toolbar component for my Aero (glasser) theme. Looks best with firefox 3.5+.

The entire Wb Aero Theme:
style 18093
style 19845
style 18094
style 18095
style 18096
style 19844

[8/01/2009]
- Better drag & drop markers
- Lots of fixes for non-Vista users
- Animated button hover
- Better support for buttons that aren't bookmarks
[7/01/2009]
- Updates for 3.5
- Changed the drop marker "chevron" at the end of the URL Bar
- Taller bar when using large icons
